a lot of work goes into this free app.

You can donate by going into the settings of the app and clicking on the PayPal option.

-HiFii Head over to here and download the strings.xml

Once you do so, translate the strings (excluding the couple of strings that have a translatable=false tag)

Then, translate into your native language and send an email to MBQSniper@gmail.com titled COUNTRY translations (with COUNTRY being whatever Country youre in.
